uber.title: Uber
uber.subtitle: Training project
uber.description: This is a simple landing page, fully responsive for all devices. In this project, I learned how to use the SASS preprocessor and how to make a mobile menu using javascript.

runSmart.title: RunSmart
runSmart.subtitle: Landing for the sale of smart watches
runSmart.description: A simple landing page with full adaptation for all devices. It is possible to send applications or buy goods by sending your contact information to the seller's mail.

movie.title: Movie
movie.subtitle: Movie database
movie.description: The application is written in typescript, using movie db. This is a site for finding movies and adding them to your favorites for later viewing. Kind of like a notebook of movies.

travel.title: Travel
travel.subtitle: Travel booking
travel.description: React application in connection with redux and API. Adaptive design. A simple example of a travel booking application. Simple registration and storage of reservations has been implemented.

marvel.title: Marvel
marvel.subtitle: Marvel info portal
marvel.description: This app is an educational mockup. Here I worked with "Marvel API". A lot of functionality was implemented in the application using many libraries, hooks, etc.
